title: Medicinal chemistry perspective on the structure–activity relationship of stilbene derivatives
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19823-19879
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02867H, Review Article

Saghi Sepehri, Mina Khedmati, Faeze Yousef-Nejad, Mohammad Mahdavi
Stilbenes are polyphenolic secondary metabolites produced in a variety of plant species and show divers biological activities.
